response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and requirements. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $14,000 for the product. This price not only reflects its worth but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire it at a competitive rate compared to its market value of $15,000. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to assist you with this valuable asset.", "product_price": 14000}
